website_summaries.verdict: The waterproof, mid-cut version of the KEEN Terradorra is well-received by female day hikers for its comfy feel and lightness. The boot’s breathability and the traction it renders on challenging terrain also score plus points from its users.On the other hand, the gear’s upper might be compromised when used in trails with abrasive elements. Overall, the KEEN Terradora Mid Waterproof has enough features to deliver performance in a lightweight package.
pros: Droves of users were impressed with how comfortable this piece of hiking gear was
The majority appreciated the lightness of this mid-cut day hiking boot
Several KEEN Terradora Mid Waterproof owners raved about its grippy outsole
The footwear required a minimal amount of time to break in, as mentioned by several outdoor enthusiasts
Less than a handful of verified purchasers found the hiker incredibly flexible
Its KEEN.Dry membrane was successful in keeping water out, according to a few consumers
cons: A couple of buyers said that the Terradora Mid Waterproof’s mesh upper rips apart after a few uses
The minority reported that this gear didn’t provide enough arch support

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These are boots you can wear for 24 hours and they will still be comfortable. The footbed of keens is the best in the world! I have only seen 5 humans in real life since I’ve gotten them, but I have gotten 4 compliments on the color!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Maria Beckman

customer_reviews.title: High quality, seemingly durable, lady boots for the special hiker in your life.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, high quality little boots. I was not disappointed and neither was my wife when she received them as a birthday gift. She was extremely grateful and could not stop talking about how nice these boots are, she made her appreciation well known to me that evening. My wife is a good lady and deserving of nice things.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Miller

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love these hiking boots! I spent 10 days hiking in the Olympic National Park area in WA during rainy season and these are the bomb. I never had to break them in, just put them on and started hiking. They are comfy, very water resistant, warm, true to size, and way cuter than most other hiking boots I tried on (a lot). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: No break-in period
customer_reviews.text: I foolishly waited until two days before a big trip to buy hiking boots, but a friend told me how great Keens are and how she didn't really have a break-in period. I took these on a 12-mile hike after breaking them in for no more than one or two brief dog walks, and they felt amazing. No blisters, fit perfectly, and I completed a two week trip with nothing but comfort from these shoes. They are warm and waterproof and look great; I couldn't be happier with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Devine

customer_reviews.title: Happy hiker
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! The first time I wore them (other than trying them on when they first arrived) was hiking the Green Mountains in Vermont. They held up very well, nice grip and comfortable right away! I have wide feet and they didnt bother me at all! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Good for slender feet
customer_reviews.text: I have slender feet but I like plenty of room for toe movement. This boot was great for me. I have run in these boots for a mile at a time. I’ve hiked in them as well. They don’t rub any spots on me and they don’t hurt. I recommend tying them a little looser so your feet have a little breathing room. This works for my feet. I realize everyone is different. But having flexible, slender feet....these are my new go to.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Boots fit great and are very comfortable and supportive of my arches. I wear a 7.5 tennis shoe and an 8 in boots. I got theses in size 8. Great color, light weight, but very excellent support and protection for feet. I've worn them around the house for 2 days. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Poor Fitting Right Boot ...
customer_reviews.text: Once I started to actually use/wear the boots; the right foot boot created excruciating pain in the toe box and expressly on the outside of my big toe. There is a stitch there that rubs my toe the wrong way and constantly. I've ordered an 8.5 in the boots and they were delivered today. I will see if a larger boot fit will alleviate the pain. I hope so, b/c I love Keen and the boots. Service/Delivery was awesome for both pair. (***1/2 Size Larger Boot did the trick*** LOVE 'EM ***)
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: First time I wore them, I went on a 6 mile hike on The Crow Hill Ledges and they felt great,no problems with pressure spots or tightness in the toe area. Very comfortable boot. I would recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: I don’t want to take them off when I get home!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shoes. I work for the post office so comfort and waterproof is needed. I don’t have sore feet anymore! And completely forget to take them off when I get home because they are so comfy... even working 12 hours a day. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Christina S.

customer_reviews.title: The best boots ever
customer_reviews.text: I have not had these boots for long but let me say they are worth every penny! I wear them everyday teaching riding lessons and working on our farm they broke in quickly and they are waterproof and clean up easily. I have been though several pairs of boots and trainers and these are the most comfortable and durable I have yet to find. Great product. I easily put in 10 miles a day.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that the shoes are light and very comfortable. Really recommend this shoes
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Russell

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Keens hiking boots for me
customer_reviews.text: I wear 8.5, but I ordered these in 9.5 and they fit perfectly. These fit like sneakers. I tried on 5 pairs of boots through Prime Wardrobe and another through regular Amazon Prime, and I liked these the best!
customer_reviews.author: Robinwren

customer_reviews.title: Hard insole
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended, the insole is thin and hard. Plus these boots are too expensive. I went back for Columbus and did one full size up.
customer_reviews.author: Zoie H

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Returned. I really wish they had Wide options. I've been on my feet all my life. I started a paper rt when I was 10.... my feet are wide!
customer_reviews.author: M. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great womens work boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I work on a horse ranch where I do a TON of walking in ALL terrain. These shoes are awesome! Perfect tread for not only dirt, gravel, mud AND snow! They fit I’d say a half size smaller than expected, but I also have wide feet. It’s so hard to find womens WORK shoes, and these exceed my expectations! I usually go through a pair of womens Ariat work boots every 4-6 months... These Keen’s are awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Mckenzie Miller

customer_reviews.title: size runs small and narrow
customer_reviews.text: Hiking shoes fits a bit snug even though I ordered a size larger than I normally wear. Not the greatest in arch support but difficult to find hiking boots that do have good arch support. Tried to add an arch support insole but boot too tight to add the insoles. Love that they are water resistant and lightweight for hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C. Hood

customer_reviews.title: Great boot but
customer_reviews.text: This is a really pretty and comfortable boot received for my birthday but it is not the boot I was hoping for. It for true to size and was great quality. I have made a return but have not been informed of a refund yet.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Jo Woods

customer_reviews.title: Fit is OFF
customer_reviews.text: I guess I got a defective shoe! Left shoe fit was very different from the other. Had to go back to my old pair till I get another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Frank E. Luna

customer_reviews.title: Small area of rubbing on the interior ankle prompted the return.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was one I wanted to try...although, after a few hours of wear indoors, there was an issue with size and there was a place on my inner ankle that rubbed on the tongue. Sorry to have to return. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Pi

customer_reviews.title: Stability
customer_reviews.text: I will use for light hiking. Fits pretty well; esp. considering the 3 foot surgeries I have had. Good support.
customer_reviews.author: Judyjudyjudy

customer_reviews.title: Better for narrower feet
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is light and fits well for those with narrower feet. My feet are slightly wide so after hiking for an hour the shoe feels tight and feet hurts around the bunion area. Wished there was a wider fit. Waterproofing is good.
customer_reviews.author: Alilo K

customer_reviews.title: Great boot! Order 1/2 size up!
customer_reviews.text: Love these a lot! Runs small so I ordered 1/2 size larger and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shoes. They are comfortable. And I like the looks of them. Only short hike so far and they were great!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Marie Storment

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, although fit snug
customer_reviews.text: I am normally in a size 8-8.5, ordered a 8.5 and it was snug so I will return for a size 9.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Good quality boot
customer_reviews.text: Have gone hiking twice and have had a comfortable experience. No areas that bind or rub!
customer_reviews.author: Peter M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Hiking Boots
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy hiking boots with good grip. I felt comfortable on mud and wet leaves uphill and down inclines and wasn't too worried about slipping. Keens run a tad bit small and narrow, but these work for me and I have a wide toe box. I also really like the way they look! I wore these around the house for a few days and took a gentle (4 mile) first hike and I still got blisters on the outside of my big toes, but that's pretty common for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great fitting boots
customer_reviews.text: I got these boots for hiking through the desert, all of my other boots don't fit well and my feet end up hurting after a few miles. I wore these boots on a short 3 mile hike the first time to test how they would feel and they feel great! The boots fit great, my feet did not hurt at all while wearing them and I hiked in amazing comfort. I'm very pleased with how these boots fit and wear, very impressed! Love them. Thank you for reading my honest review, I hope it is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: BLB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I have had one other pairs of hiking boots, but I returned them because they were so comfortable. I was so impressed when I wore these boots. My foot molded right into them! It felt like I wasn't even wearing shoes! The waterproofness to them is also awesome. Not a single drop of water gets into my shoe! I would recommend sizing up in these, especially since you will mostly likely wear thicker socks with these. I would recommend a half size bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful pair of hiking boots that keep my feet happy. They’re very comfortable and provide excellent support. They’re mid height so they keep my weak ankles that like to roll in place. The boots are warm but breathable and after a six hour hike my feet felt great. The quality on these boots is superb. The most important thing when you enjoy hiking is taking care of your feet, and I definitely think these are well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Great wintertime hiking/commuting boot
customer_reviews.text: My wife is thrilled with these boots. They fit a bit on the snug side but we think they will break-in and loosen a bit. She loves the overall support, both for arch and ankle support. The rubber sole is grippy and appears to handle snow/mud by its tread pattern, and the lace loops and laces all align well and tighten up well. Both wife and I own Keen shoes and we have yet to be disappointed, this boot is another win for us and them!
customer_reviews.author: B.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these hiking boots. I can wear them during rainy days as they are water resistant and you can't easily slip with them on. The boots feel like armor for my feet and are light weight. You do feel the padding of the material in the boot and it may take some getting used to as they are not as light weight as sneakers but they are totally worth it when using them for a hiking trip.
customer_reviews.author: Matt from California

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but a smidge narrow
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these are decent hiking boots. Fit true to size, but they do run more form fitting and narrow (but that's clearly stated in the description). I like the ankle support for hilly hikes. The only issue I have withe them is the spot I'm pointing to in the picture...something rubs on the inside right there in that spot (like part of the tongue or seam).
customer_reviews.author: Booknerd28

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-duty, despite being lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Boots replaced heavier hiking boots. They were comfortable even on the most rugged terrain. I've worn them around heavily rain-soaked property, and no sign of leaking. Material seems flexible enough to handle long-and-steep hikes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: City Ice & Fuel Oil Co.

customer_reviews.title: Great trail shoes/
customer_reviews.text: Excellent keen quality in these shoes. I am on trails with my dog a fair amount and love these shoes for their warmth, good support and traction. Very comfortable too. I like the look of them - rugged but not enormous.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Zolar

customer_reviews.title: Sewed wrong
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be good, but there’s too much fabric attaching the tongue and it rubs on the inside of my left foot. Right foot shoe didn’t have that big ball of fabric. Maybe a one off? I can’t decide if I should try another pair. It might be the same.
customer_reviews.author: LEW

customer_reviews.title: Boots ok, hooks are a hazard!
customer_reviews.text: Really hurt myself falling over when the lace from one boot caught the hook on the other, a bit of a poor design there. I put fit as expected but actually bought a half size bigger as others had suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline I.B

customer_reviews.title: Love these waterproof lightweight boots
customer_reviews.text: I already have these this is my second pair. I have a size UK 4 one toe seems to get sore, if I wear thick socks. I have ordered a 4.5 gone up a half size. I’m hoping that this will work as they really are wonderful Boots. Mid ankle higher than shoes not as I high as most boots. Quite lightweight for walking boots & waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

product_meta.title: KEEN Women's Terradora 2 Mid Height Waterproof Hiking Boot
product_meta.description: With our updated women's-specific fit Terradora Mid Height Waterproof hiking boots, we kept all the things women love about the original and added more performance, more comfort, and more traction—so you can go even further and stay out there longer. KEEN products are consciously created using a natural, pesticide-free probiotic-based technology called Eco Anti-Odour for breaking down odour in sweat, PFC-free water repellent (in applicable styles) and leather sourced from Leather Working Group (LWG)-certified tanneries. KEEN makes shoes to make a difference. From the products it makes, to the actions the it takes, KEEN inspires people to live and work monumental every day. As a brand born for life outside, KEEN has a responsibility to protect and conserve the places where all people live, play and work.With our updated Terradora waterproof hiking boots, we kept all the things women love about the original and added more performance, more comfort, and more traction—so you can go even further and stay out there longer.
feature_bullets: WATERPROOF: KEEN.DRY: reathable membrane keeps out the wet elements while allowing air to pass through for a drier, more comfortable foot environment
TRACTION: KEEN ALL-TERRAIN rubber outsole with 4mm multidirectional lugs higher-traction grip; Non-marking rubber outsoles leaves no trace or imprints when walking indoors

SUPPORT & COMFORT: Removable, dual-density PU insole with arch support for long-lasting comfort; Lightweight EVA midsole offers cushioned support and shock absorption; Stability shank delivers lightweight support
CARE TIPS: We recommend using mild soap and cold water; To remove excess dirt or spot clean, use a stiff brush or soft cloth; Let boots air dry away from heat
FIT & DESIGN: Women's-specific fit; Anatomical flex grooves for natural movement; Removable, dual-density PU insole with arch support provides additional cushioning for long lasting comfort
